claim: Barbarella was directed in 2011 by Roger Vadim.

supporting.text: The original 'Barbarella' film was released in 1968 and directed by Roger Vadim; no official remake or new version exists under that title from 2011.

attacks.text: The original 'Barbarella' film was released in 1968 and directed by Roger Vadim; no official remake or new version exists under that title from 2011.

No unofficial adaptations of 'Barbarella' are recognized by credible film archives or databases.
Roger Vadim passed away in 1993, making it impossible for him to direct a film in 2011.
All known films titled 'Barbarella' are from 1968 or later remakes, none from 2011.

supporting.text: Roger Vadim died in 2000, making it impossible for him to have directed any film in 2011.

attacks.text: Roger Vadim died in 2000, making it impossible for him to have directed any film in 2011.
